Title: Illuminated Incipit with Headpiece for Chapter 19
Medium: ink and pigments on Italian paper with a watermark of three crescents
Description: This page from Walters manuscript W.568 has an illuminated headpiece inscribed with the chapter heading for chapter 19 (Surat Maryam) in the New Abbasid (Broken Cursive) style in gold ink. The text is written in a large Maghribi script, with vocalization in red, green, and yellow ink.
Keywords: Koran; Qur`an; Arabic; Islamic; Book; Calligraphy; Codex; Illumination; Manuscript; Maghreb; Scripture
Provenance: Henry Walters, Baltimore [date and mode of acquisition unknown]; Walters Art Museum, 1931, by bequest.
Creator: African
